content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'ParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'treinamento_adlstrnsolar_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [treinamento_adlstrnsolar_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://treinamento@adlstrnsolar.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE SILVER.D_CATEGORIA_AR (
	[ID_CATEGORIA] int,
	[NOME_CATEGORIA] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'silver/CATEGORIA',
	DATA_SOURCE = [treinamento_adlstrnsolar_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [ParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM SILVER.D_CATEGORIA_AR
GO
